pages.text: In the heat, there is nothing better than a cool fruit compote. Brewed from rowan berries with the addition of cherry extract, this drink has a pleasant refreshing taste, and the addition of other ingredients grants it special properties. $(o)If you deign to drink this beverage – your heart will beat faster, and your limbs will move more swiftly, just keep up$().

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: Sage, rowan, cherry, and sugar – a recipe that $(o)swiftly$() gained popularity during the first Olympic Games.
